trans-unit.source: Bars
For actions with an unknown number of steps you can use a spinner:
trans-unit.target: 对于步骤数不详的动作,您可以使用旋转器。

trans-unit.source: Instead of passing all configuration options on instatiation, you can create your custom subclass:
trans-unit.target: 而不是在实例化时传递所有的配置选项,你可以创建你的自定义子类。

trans-unit.source: Progress bars are very customizable, you can change their width, their fill character, their suffix and more:
trans-unit.target: 进度条是非常可定制的,你可以改变它们的宽度、填充字符、后缀等等。

trans-unit.source: Spinners
The result will be a bar like the following: ::
trans-unit.target: 结果将是一个类似下面的条形图。::

trans-unit.source: There are 5 predefined spinners:
There are 7 progress bars to choose from:

trans-unit.source: You can also override any of the arguments or create your own:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以覆盖任何参数或创建你自己的参数。

trans-unit.target: 一个大的库,有很多有用的工具,它不仅仅是操作系统和系统工具......

trans-unit.source: bug fixing, making functions and classes faster and maybe adding threading support follow me on libaries.io for info about new releases
trans-unit.target: 修正bug,让函数和类的速度更快,也许还能增加线程支持,请在libaries.io上关注我,了解新版本的信息。
